summary: My thoughts on Fantastic Beasts 2
body:
My thoughts on Fantastic Beasts 2

-Albus “Gay” Dumbledore

-Bunty was hella thirsty for Newt Ya’ll!!

-WTF Queenie? You sicko!

-Minerva going all ‘Curious Case of Benjamin Button in this movie’

-Cormac Mcglaggen’s great great grandpa literally as cocky as him

-Well done Leta you make us Slytherin proud *sniff*

-That switching baby stuff sounds like typical Indonesian soap opera smh

-Bro moment between Theseus and Newt

summary: Fantastic Beasts.
body:
Fantastic Beasts.

(Something is missing)

Harry Potter.

What could possibly be missing?

Yes, a movie about TOM RIDDLE and his RISE TO POWER.

Please J.K. Rowling, make this happen.

Sincerely

Every potterhead.

blog.name: dodecahedrondream
blog.title: You Mean You Don't Dream of Dodecahedrons?

summary: Crimes of Grindelwald spoilers!!!! Don't read if you haven't seen
body:
Crimes of Grindelwald spoilers!!!! Don’t read if you haven’t seen

Okay so like one thing that’s really bothering me is the blood bond. Like so it makes it so that Dumbledore literally just cannot fight Grindelwald. But like that’s such a copout. Jk Rowling made Dumbledore have a complex relationship with him (especially adding his gayness) that’s the reason he avoided fighting him for several years, and the bloodbond seems a way to avoid actually discussing that.

It feels like a way to just settle and be like yeah nope no complex feelings here, the only reason I’m not fighting him is because I physically can’t.

NOT TO MENTION its directly contradicts the events surrounding Ariana’s death. Because like Dumbledore, Grindelwald and Aberforth were all dueling then, and how would Dumbledore and Grindelwald be able to if they had a blood bond preventing them from fighting.

summary: Corsa delle 36 ore [Multifandom]
title: Corsa delle 36 ore [Multifandom]
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2DN31jA

by larana

Una raccolta di drabble e flashfic su vari personaggi, coppie e fandom.
Partecipa alla Corsa delle 36 ore indetta da Torre di Carta.

1. Sergio Marquina&Andrés de Fonollosa (La casa de papel) pre-serie, vago emotional!h/c. [500 parole]
2. Scarlet Benoit/Ze'ev Kesley (Wolf), (Scarlet - Lunar Chronicles ), post-saga, emotional!h/c. [500 parole]
3. Ian/Wanda, (The Host), fluff [500 parole]
4. James/Lily, (Harry Potter), feelings denial [408 parole]

Words: 1900, Chapters: 4/?, Language: Italiano

  • Fandoms: La casa de papel | Money Heist (TV), Lunar Chronicles - Marissa Meyer, The Host - Stephenie Meyer, Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling

tags: fantastic beasts and where to find them
summary:
Something about Fantastic Beasts: Crimes of Grindelwald 
Leta Lestrange (Zoë Kravitz) is a queen. She deserves...
body:
Something about Fantastic Beasts: Crimes of Grindelwald

  • Leta Lestrange (Zoë Kravitz) is a queen. She deserves better😭
  • Grindelwald made Voldemort look like a child
  • Newt and Tina are still perfect for each other. Newtina will be amazing no matter what happens
  • Credence is still a lost kid that fucking needs help
  • Niffler is everything💕
  • Alison Sudol is amazing! And I really like Queenie’s dark side.❤
  • Winda Rosier is very lovely and she’s actually the perfect villain!❤
  • Nagini is a beautiful soul and just thinking about her future makes me wanna cry💚
  • I am in need of a Theseus hug!

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Немного о фильме Фантастические Твари: Преступления Грин-де-вальда

  • Лита Лестрейндж (Зои Кравец) королева этого фильма. Она заслуживает бо́льшего😭
  • Волан-де-морт по сравнению с Грин-де-вальдом просто ребёнок какой-то
  • Ньют и Тина по-прежнему идеально подходят друг другу. “Ньютина” будет прекрасна, не важно что происходит
  • Криденс все еще потерянный ребенок, который чертовски нуждается в помощи
  • Нюхлер это наше всё…💕
  • Элисон Судол потрясающая. И мне безумно нравится эта тёмная сторона Куинни. Кхм, да и саму Эли я обожаю❤
  • Винда Розье очень милая. На самом деле, она идеальная злодейка.❤
  • Нагини - прекрасная, и от одной мысли о ее будущем мне хочется плакать💚
  • Мне очень нужны обнимашки Тесея!

summary: Reasons to watch Crimes of Grindelwald (spoilers obvs)
body:
Reasons to watch Crimes of Grindelwald (spoilers obvs)

  • Newt’s face of disappointment of not seeing Tina
  • Jacob / Queenie
  • “You don’t need to enchant me because i’m already enchanted”
  • Jacob and Newt brotp
  • Jacob and Newt lovesick over their SO
  • Jacob being a wingman
  • NewTina pining and brief angst
  • “….like Salamanders”
  • Leta Le Strange
  • Theseus Scamamder
  • Credence
  • Nagini
  • The Chinese dragon..ish?
  • The water dragon…ish?
  • The almost Newt Scamander fanservice
  • Hogwarts
  • Dumble-damn
  • Hogwarts
  • Dumby and Grindy’s past
  • “We were closer than brothers”
  • Grindelwald vaping WWII

  • The joy

  • The t e a r s

summary: Newt Proposing Headcannon
body:
Newt Proposing Headcannon

Newt gets down on one knee to propose but the box is empty because the Niffler got there first, so you both have to go around chasing for your ring back.

summary: Watching the second Harry Pothead film and seeing Dobby being this sort of comic relief type at first is a little awkward...
body: Watching the second Harry Pothead film and seeing Dobby being this sort of comic relief type at first is a little awkward knowing what inevitably happens to him at the end of the series, both in the books and the films.
